subject: Seeing red 🤬
body:
View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/3a7eaca9-4533-4930-8063-6c6d88709e41/Daily_dispatch.png?t=1740415446)
Caption: 

### 📝 What you need to know

Bitcoin fell to its [lowest price in weeks](https://decrypt.co/333158/bitcoin-ethereum-sink-tariff-gloom-rate-optimism) early Friday following another round of tariff hits from President Trump against trading partners, along with a rough jobs report that included sharp revisions to previous months’ data.

Altcoins are down worse than Bitcoin, with Ethereum and Solana falling 5% compared to a 3% dip for BTC, while stock indices are showing red on the day. And Coinbase stock has taken a dive, down 15% today following [Thursday’s earnings miss](https://decrypt.co/333038/coinbase-stock-dives-company-q2-revenue-forecasts).

Bitcoin is now nearly 7% away from its all-time high mark hit in July, with CryptoQuant analysts expecting the correction to [potentially last months](https://decrypt.co/333081/bitcoin-correction-more-downside-likely-cryptoquant) as whales and miners cash out profits. But one analyst told _Decrypt_ that rising optimism for a rate cut at the next Fed meeting could fuel further gains.

“Now that rate cuts are back on the table for the next Fed meeting, liquidity conditions may open up again—a powerful tailwind for risk assets like crypto,” said 21Shares Research Analyst Matt Mena. “If a Fed cut becomes all but guaranteed, Bitcoin could quickly propel toward $125K.”

Bitcoin, Ethereum Sink as Tariff Gloom Tops Rate Cut Optimism: (https://decrypt.co/333158/bitcoin-ethereum-sink-tariff-gloom-rate-optimism)

Bitcoin Correction Could Linger for Months: CryptoQuant: (https://decrypt.co/333081/bitcoin-correction-more-downside-likely-cryptoquant)

Crypto Markets See Red as Solana, XRP, Dogecoin Extend Losses: (https://decrypt.co/333090/solana-xrp-dogecoin-extend-losses)

Metaplanet Plans $3.7B Stock Raise to Fuel Massive Bitcoin Buying Spree: (https://decrypt.co/333132/metaplanet-plans-3-7b-stock-raise-to-fuel-massive-bitcoin-buying-spree)

## 💬 Quote of the Day

““Staff at [the FDIC] continue to stonewall our efforts to shed light on the previous administration's Operation Chokepoint 2.0. We can't and won’t stand for it.”“ — [Coinbase Chief Legal Officer Paul Grewal](https://decrypt.co/333110/fdic-still-trying-to-stonewall-crypto-debanking-documents-says-coinbase-legal-chief) claims hurdles in seeking debanking evidence
